# Fun Function
```{r}
treeplotcustom <- function(file){
  temp <- read.tree(file)
  plot(temp)
}
```

# Tree from Perez-Losada, 2009
```{r, fig.height = 20, fig.width = 15}
treeplotcustom("../data-raw/perez-losada.txt")
```
